metadata.title: CVE-2016-0837 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: MPEG4Extractor.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.x before4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-04-01allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read and memory corruption) via a crafted mediafile, aka internal bug 27208621.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
